cause.description:
Thank you for supporting my mission for a better world! The Church Of Sexy Party would like to thank you for the support! We encourage everyone to donate funds mostly for them selves - to have a Sexy Party!
1. To help others
2. To teach the Gospel of Sexy Party
3. Learn how to maximize the spirit of life!
cause.mission: To help the ones that need it the most!
cause.name: The Church Of Sexy Party fund!
